mainPackage

Class Loader3DScan

  • java.lang.Object
    • mainPackage.Loader3DScan

  • public class Loader3DScan
extends java.lang.Object
    The Loader3DScan reads a serie of text files, one text file containing a matrice representing a 2D layer. The first reading of that class is just to create a list of shades of grey. Then the loader is passed to AssociationFrame to do the associations between the shades and material, then the loader is passed to the constructor of InternalVoxelizedWorld
    Author:
    Guitard Alan
    See Also:
    InternalVoxelizedWorld.InternalVoxelizedWorld(Loader3DScan, javax.swing.JProgressBar)
